classes.name: ChangeType
classes.docstring: Types of changes that can occur in negative spaces

classes.name: ChangeMetrics
classes.docstring: Metrics for quantifying changes in negative spaces

methods.name: to_array
methods.docstring: Convert metrics to a numpy array

methods.name: from_array
methods.docstring: Create ChangeMetrics from a numpy array

classes.name: TemporalSignature
classes.docstring: Represents a signature that captures temporal patterns in negative space

methods.name: __init__
methods.docstring:
Initialize a temporal signature

Args:
    window_size: Number of time steps to include in the signature

methods.name: add_metrics
methods.docstring:
Add change metrics to the history

Args:
    metrics: The change metrics to add

methods.name: visualize
methods.docstring:
Visualize the temporal signature

Args:
    output_path: Optional path to save the visualization. If None, the
               visualization is displayed but not saved.

methods.name: save
methods.docstring:
Save the temporal signature to a file

Args:
    filepath: Path to save the signature

methods.name: load
methods.docstring:
Load a temporal signature from a file

Args:
    filepath: Path to the saved signature
    
Returns:
    TemporalSignature: The loaded signature

classes.name: NegativeSpaceTracker
classes.docstring: Tracks changes in negative spaces over time

methods.name: __init__
methods.docstring:
Initialize a negative space tracker

Args:
    memory_frames: Number of previous frames to store

methods.name: add_point_cloud
methods.docstring:
Add a new point cloud to the tracker and compute changes

Args:
    point_cloud: The point cloud to add (either Open3D or simplified)
    
Returns:
    ChangeMetrics: Metrics describing the changes

methods.name: get_change_type
methods.docstring:
Determine the type of change based on metrics

Args:
    metrics: Change metrics to analyze
    
Returns:
    ChangeType: The type of change that occurred

methods.name: visualize_changes
methods.docstring:
Visualize the changes over time

Args:
    output_path: Optional path to save the visualization. If None, the
               visualization is displayed but not saved.

methods.name: get_temporal_signature
methods.docstring:
Get the current temporal signature

Returns:
    TemporalSignature: The current temporal signature
